label: lem-single-walker-own-status-error
name: Let $\mathcal{S}_1$ and $\mathcal{S}_2$ be two swarm states
relations_established: Change in expected distance from walker's own status change bounded by D_Y
natural_language_statement: Let $\mathcal{S}_1$ and $\mathcal{S}_2$ be two swarm states. For any walker $i$ whose survival status changes ($s_{1,i} \neq s_{2,i}$), the absolute difference in its expected raw distance measurement is bounded by the diameter of the algorithmic space, $D_{\mathcal{Y}}$.
